participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.background: I take advantage of my free time to explore the many places the United States has to offer. I live in a nice attic apartment in Portland, OR. I'm a pilot for Southwest. My friends tell me that I am a neurotic hypochondriac. I want to write a book before I die.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.background: I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing. I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs. I get to share my love of animals and storytelling with others. I once got a chocolate bar that my dog didn't like, so I got to eat it all! I like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts.

content.text: I'm doing great! I'm a pilot for Southwest Airlines and I love exploring the many places the United States has to offer.
That sounds amazing! I'm single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing.
What kind of fish do you like to catch?
I like to catch all kinds of fish, but my favorite is probably bass.
I've never caught a bass before, but I've heard they're a lot of fun to catch.
They are! They're very strong and put up a good fight.
I try to go as often as I can, but it can be tough with my busy schedule.
I know what you mean. I'm a pilot for Southwest Airlines and I'm always on the go.
That sounds like an awesome job! I bet you get to see some amazing places.
I do! I've been all over the United States and I've even been to a few other countries.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to travel the world.
You should! It's an amazing experience.
I will! Thanks for the inspiration.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about travel
